content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -25.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently not connected and has no energy.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Iron plate mine at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, -73.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) that is currently not receiving power.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of an assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) that is currently not receiving electricity.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to offshore pump
- Ensure that the pipes are correctly placed and that there is a clear path for the connection. Check the positions of the boiler and offshore pump to confirm they are within range.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to power connections
- Verify that all electrical connections are properly established and that the entities requiring power are linked to a power source. Check for any missing connections or broken links in the electricity network.
